snippet: The opening of the state’s first medical marijuana dispensary in Montclair, coming three years after passage of a law that made it possible, was a very businesslike affair.
abstract: New Jersey opens its first and so far only medical marijuana dispensary, in downtown Montclair; opening comes three years after passage of law that made it possible.
lead_paragraph: The opening of the state’s first medical marijuana dispensary in Montclair, coming three years after passage of a law that made it possible, was a very businesslike affair.

headline.seo: For Medical Marijuana in New Jersey, a First Few Ounces
headline.main: First Ounces of Marijuana Leave a New Jersey Dispensary
headline.print_headline: First Ounces of Marijuana Leave a New Jersey Dispensary
